email_body: Sorry for not responding. I don't look at my email constantly through the day. Don't have much to do in Q/U still it widens back out. Thanks, John slafontaine@globalp.com on 10/05/2000 01:05:27 PM To: jarnold@enron.com cc: Subject: aug/sep i think your selling the whole curve-if your interested im .005 bid for 300 aug/sep ngas. let me know if your interested. dont let silverman get you into too much trouble tonite
